pullRequest.title: [RHPAM-2813] Allow to use 'user' query parameter with /contents/output REST API.
pullRequest.bodyText: kie api service in jbpm to store task event with another user.

nodes.bodyText: Cast to Map<String, Object> is not needed. Please, remove.
This method description might be reworded, as to differ saveContenFromUser from the saveContent method.
